wikipedia_page.main: Jack Laskey is an English actor best known for his theatre work and his role as DS Jakes in the ITV drama series Endeavour. He is the third son of Michael Laskey, a poet. Laskey trained at the Royal Academy of Dramatic Art (RADA).

response: * I Am the Wind by Jon Fosse. English-language version by Simon Stephens. Direction Patrice Chéreau and Thierry Theiu Niang. With Tom Brooke and Jack Laskey.

At the Odéon he staged in 1992 Le Temps et la Chambre by Botho Strauss. He directed Dans la solitude des champs de coton again in 1995, shown at Ivry, the Wiener Festwochen and the Brooklyn Academy of Music. He staged in 2011 Jon Fosse's  Je suis le vent in an English version, I Am the Wind, by Simon Stephens at the Young Vic Theatre, with Tom Brooke and Jack Laskey.

Laskey is married to a general practitioner, and they have three sons, including the actor Jack Laskey. Since 1978, they have lived in Suffolk.

Secret Sharer is a 2014 Anglo-Polish romantic thriller based on Joseph Conrad’s 1909 novella The Secret Sharer.Hunter, Alan. "Secret Sharer review: Suspicion, mystery and melodrama in seafaring thriller". Express."Film Review: 'Secret Sharer'". Cine Vue. It is directed and written by Peter Fudakowski,Young, Graham. "Movie Review: Secret Sharer (12A) ". Birmingham Mail. and it stars Jack Laskey and Zhu Zhu. It was released in the United Kingdom on 20 June 2014.

In the present day Gulf of Thailand, novice sea captain Konrad (Jack Laskey) tries to master a Chinese cargo ship and its resentful crew, who suspect he has orders from his boss to scuttle the vessel as part of an insurance scam.
* Jack Laskey as Konrad

This article contains summaries of characters appearing on the ITV/Masterpiece TV series Endeavour, first broadcast since 2 January 2012: Shaun Evans (DC/DS Endeavour Morse), Roger Allam (DCI Fred Thursday),  James Bradshaw (Dr Max DeBryn), Anton Lesser (CS Reginald Bright), Sean Rigby (PC/DS Jim Strange), Caroline O’Neill, (Win Thursday), Jack Bannon (Sam Thursday), Jack Laskey (DS Peter Jakes), Sara Vickers (Joan Thursday), Abigail Thaw (Dorothea Frazil), Dakota Blue Richards (WPC Shirley Trewlove), Lewis Peek (DC George Fancy), Simon Harris (DI Ronnie Box) and Richard Riddell (DS Alan Jago).

Peter Jakes is the Detective Sergeant working under Fred Thursday and is played by Jack Laskey. Jakes works diligently as a policeman, trying to earn his keep and impress Thursday. However, Jakes can be seen as somewhat unscrupulous and vindictive and often puts up a front of bravado to try and impress his superiors and women at the local pubs with his exploits.
